Plot method

Plot method for class mhtest.

# S3 method for mhtest
plot(x, type = c("Manhattan", "Volcano"),
  main = paste(type, "plot"), cex = 0.5, pch = 19, ...)

Arguments

x
An object of class mhtest.
type
Either
  • "Manhattan": plot of the negative logarithm (in base 10) of p-values.
  • "Volcaco": plot of the negative logarithm of p-values against the estimation of coefficients (e.g. betas in linear regression).
main
The title of the plot. Default use the type.
cex
Graphical parameter: relative size of points. Default is 0.5.
pch
Graphical parameter: type of points. Default uses "filled" points.
...
Other arguments to be passed to plot().

Value

NULL. Creates a plot.

See also

big_univLinReg and big_univLogReg.
